segments.text: Come on ! It's time to go !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait a minute ! Just hold your horses ! What's your hurry , anyway ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I've got to stop and get gas in the car , first .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , it won't if there no line at the pump .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll give you five more minutes , then I'm going on without you !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You wouldn't do a thing like that !
segments.speaker: S2
